Text: Photograph: Christopher Thomond/The Guardian  Thomas Cook has ceased trading after talks failed to produce a funding lifeline for the ailing travel company, placing 9,000 British jobs at risk and triggering a huge repatriation effort to bring home 150,000 UK holidaymakers overseas.
Cause: Photograph: Christopher Thomond/The Guardian  Thomas Cook has ceased trading after talks failed to produce a funding lifeline for the ailing travel company
Effect: placing 9,000 British jobs at risk and triggering a huge repatriation effort to bring home 150,000 UK holidaymakers overseas.
